csv: 2015-18 UBCP MASTER PRODUCTION AGREEMENT WAGE RATES
The UBCP may allocate one-half percent (0.5%) of the wage increase to fringe benefits in either the second or
third year of the contract, in which case the wage increase shall be reduced to one and one-half percent (1.5%)
for the chosen year, by giving advance notice to the Negotiating Producers at least ninety (90) days prior to
April 3, 2016 or April 2, 2017, respectively. If such allocation occurs, then the Negotiating Producers will issue
